title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 501.3 - Extension of time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 501.3 - Extension of time

State Regulations

When an application is made for an extension of time within
which to make and file any annual or periodic report with the commissioner or
to comply with any provision of an order of the commissioner, the application
shall be filed before the expiration of the period prescribed, shall be
verified and shall set forth in detail: (a) what effort has been made by the
applicant to prepare such report or to comply with the order within the time
specified; (b) facts tending to
show why said report could not be made and filed or the order complied with
within the time prescribed; (c) other facts which justify an extension of time; and
(d) the further period of time necessarily
required within which to make and file such report or to comply with an
order. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
501.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
